column5: I heard through the grapevine that the owner Jim Jordan has pasted away is this true ? He was a great man and also a friend, been going to SLL on and off for over 25 year's. If this is true it's a sad day for all that knew him, if anyone has any info on his death please let us know. Thank's Rob (PIKE PRO)
Yes. It's true Jim passed away after a long battle with cancer. The information is posted on the camps face book page.
